column4: After the last ubuntu 7.04 updates my flash doesnt work. Is someone else experiencing the same problem?
had the same issues.. I downloaded the deb from trevino and it worked again
what to you mean by trevino ?
google it: "trevino feisty", Trevino has made some packages for ubuntu.. I wouldn't use them.. except for the one called flash-plugin-nonfree, to get your flash working again
